text: Yi ti manisaharu hun jasala'i aphna gharaharubata binakarana nikaliyo, matra yasa kurako lagi ki tiniharu bhanchan ki ‘‘hamro palanakarta allaha ho.’’ Yadi allahale manisaharula'i eka arkobata nahata'irakheko bha'e upasana sthalaharu girjaghara ra masjida, yahudi prarthana bhavana ra ti masjidaharu pani dhaline thi'e jasama allahako bes'sari nama li'incha. Allahale avasya nai usako sahayata garnecha, jasale usako sahayata gardacha niscaya nai allaha thulo balasali sarvasakti sampanna cha
